title: Can riot post texture update videos for champions in patch 5.6?
body: In patch 5.6, u updated kayle, lee sin, patheon, but u didn't give the texture update videos on skinspotlight on youtube. I want to see how lee sin changed from this texture update, so plz upload that videos as you did before for several champions.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

SkinSpotlights actually isn't something that Riot makes! It's a third party who works with Surrender@20 in regards to League of Legends coverage. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=8cV8qHcM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-03T01:07:26.571+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> SkinSpotlights actually isn't something that Riot makes! It's a third party who works with Surrender@20 in regards to League of Legends coverage. :]

Can Full Metal Pantheon please have its coloring returned? It's very dissimilar. I know you can't do an exact match, but I've seen silver on a number of post-updated models/skins so I know it can be done. Not digging the gun-metal, it's not why I bought the skin.
